name: EGNATIA AVIATION Ltd.
about: Egnatia Aviation Ltd. is a premier flight training academy based in Greece, founded in 2006. As the largest Flight Training Organisation in Greece and one of the largest in Europe, we offer holistic airline pilot training programs approved by EASA, GCAA, and QCAA. Our state-of-the-art facilities at Kavalaâ€™s Lydia Aerodrome include modern classrooms, a fleet of new-generation aircraft, and six advanced flight simulators. We provide integrated and modular training courses, conversion programs, and MCC training, all tailored to airline standards and procedures. With a diverse student body from over 57 nationalities, we are committed to delivering the best flight training conditions in Europe, ensuring our graduates are well-prepared for careers in commercial aviation. Egnatia Aviation is dedicated to fostering well-trained pilots in every category of civil aviation specialization.
